execution_plan.description: Retrieve all EU orders together with the customer email and EU customer id. These rows will be used to identify customers (by email) who placed orders in the EUR region.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.id AS eu_order_id, o.customer_id AS eu_customer_id, c.email AS email FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE c.email IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all US orders together with the customer email and US customer id. These rows will be used to identify customers (by email) who placed orders in the USD region.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.id AS us_order_id, o.customer_id AS us_customer_id, c.email AS email FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE c.email IS NOT NULL;
